reference.shortdesc: Italic text is text that is used to emphasize the key points in printed text, or when quoting a speaker, to show which words the speaker stressed.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The content of the i element is typically rendered in an italic font.
The bold component is typically rendered in an italic font.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The i element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.
